page.title: 08DRAINAGE IN SOMERSET
page.content: In{Somerset}farmers are given grant aid to finance the farmers fight to prevent flooding of the land.Money is also given help to other people with drainage difficulties. In{1976}the{Land Drainage Act,}gave powers to the people from the government to drain the land. In Somerset the farmers join together to form an{internal water board}and have a lot of authority on how things are run.The farmers elect a farmer to represent them on the{Somerset Water {Board . In Somerset, about{2.5 million pounds is spent on drainage each year.
